column5: Tried something new tonight... Walleye scampi  Sauted garlic in butter and lemon juice... 5 minutes....  Then poured that over walleye in a baking dish...  Seasoned with salt... Pepper... Dill... Oregano and parsley....  Then baked at 350 for 25 minutes....  Turned out amazing.... No leftovers....  Thought I'd share...
well, actually, you didn't share     sounds good, gonna try it
Ive done almost exactly the same. Amazing!!!!  Good on ya dood, im sure everyone loved it. We did ours served over spinach and cherry tomatoes

Sounds good Mike. If you wanna try something different to go with that . Cook up some Basmati rice. Dead easy. The leftover sauce from baking any kind of fish is awesome over Basmati rice. Chop up a few green onions and sprinkle over the fish and rice and drizzle with the sauce from the baking dish... some salt and cracked pepper....AWESOME
